name: electron-window-rotator
description: Rotate native Electron window on macOS
author: Anton Fisher <a.fschr@gmail.com> (http://antonfisher.com)

scripts.start: npm run build && cd demo && npm start
scripts.release:patch: npm run build && npx standard-version -r patch && git push --follow-tags origin main
scripts.release:minor: npm run build && npx standard-version -r minor && git push --follow-tags origin main
scripts.release:major: npm run build && npx standard-version -r major && git push --follow-tags origin main
